game_description: The most advanced VR fighting game to date! Fight against 12 unique fighters with a complete set of martials arts techniques and combos, and 15 different special powers. Try the game free with this limited content demo version or puchase the full version at https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/9026710184066320/ Feel a stunning immersive combat experience that will make other fighting games bite the dust! To defeat your enemies, you'll have to adapt to each opponent style. You will have to train your striking, evasion, blocking and specials powers skills to become the toughest fighter in the world. Improve your stamina, body strength and technique while you have a great fighting time. Unleash the dragon inside you!
